Package com.laundry.laundryMgmt.controllers

Class MachineController

java.lang.Object
com.laundry.laundryMgmt.controllers.MachineController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173", maxAge=3600L) @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/machines") public class MachineController extends Object
Author:
David PETREL Controller class handling endpoints related to machine in the laundry management system.

      @GetMapping public List<MachineRecord> findAll()

      Returns:

    • findById

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}") public MachineRecord findById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a machine by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the machine to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The MachineEntity object if found, otherwise null.

    • create

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MachineRecord> create(@RequestBody MachineCommand machineCommand)
      Creates a new machine using the provided MachineCommand and saves it to the database.
      Parameters:
      machineCommand - The MachineCommand object containing machine details.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the created MachineRecord if successful, along with a log message.

    • updateStatus

      @PutMapping(path="/updateAvailable/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MachineRecord> updateStatus(@PathVariable Long id)
      Updates the status of a machine by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the machine to update.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the updated MachineEntity object if successful, otherwise a bad request.

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}") public void delete(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a machine by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the machine to delete.
